app.title: GitHub Release Stats
app.madeWith: Made with using Lit & Bootstrap.

comparison.title: Compare Releases
comparison.description: Enter a GitHub username and repository to see download statistics and compare them with others.

charts.zoomHint: Use mouse wheel to zoom, and click and drag to pan.

settings.apiAuthDescription: Provide a GitHub Personal Access Token to increase the API rate limit from 60 to 5,000 requests per hour. The token is stored only in your browser's local storage.

modals.saveSetPlaceholder: Enter a name for this set

errors.authRequired: An API key is required to view history for Stars or Open Issues. Please add a GitHub Personal Access Token in the settings below to enable this feature.
errors.fetchRepoData: An error occurred while fetching repository data. One or more repositories might not exist or the API rate limit was exceeded.
errors.fetchStarHistory: Failed to fetch star history data.
errors.fetchIssueHistory: Failed to fetch issue history data.
errors.rateLimitExceeded: You've hit the GitHub API rate limit. Please wait a while before trying again.
errors.networkError: A network error occurred while checking the user.
errors.addRepoToSave: Add at least one repository to save a set.
